mil7.8.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.8.4:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.8.4:1.1_0: “Are you able to take three things that should be cultivated?”
mil7.8.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a noble disciple who lives with good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind should be mortified.
mil7.8.4:2.1_0: Furthermore, a field has died on the field and ate the water.
mil7.8.4:2.2_0: In the same way, a disciple who lives the neighborhood of the ascetic life, taking care of ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
mil7.8.4:3.1_0: Furthermore, a field is getting up and plenty of seed. And they’ve said many seeds.
mil7.8.4:3.2_0: In the same way, when a house is given up and wide, closely together with the lay people, it’s very fruitful and beneficial.
mil7.8.4:3.4_0: Because, great king, the senior monks have spoken the Monastic Law,
